channel.title: Birthday EP/Album Remixes
channel.description:
*For those who follow me on Instagram will already know about this.*
I am looking for producers who would like to remix a track of mine for the Birthday EP/Album. The EP/Album will be posted on SoundCloud, YouTube, Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music, etc. (If you do not want your remixes on any of these platforms, let me know).
If you are interested, send me a direct message either here in the forums, on Discord (GreyOldTwit#5286) or on Instagram (gr3ymusic). If you can’t direct message me on Auxy Forums, Discord or Instagram; simply post a comment that “you are interested” and I will direct message you here on the forums.
The deadline is the 1st of May, 12am (Australian Central). This gives me enough time to sort out and submit the tracks in time to release it on my Birthday, as well as time for you guys to remix the track without being rushed.
I hope that you guys will be interested in doing this remix.
~ GR3Y

item.title: Birthday EP/Album Remixes
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
Did some thinking over. I’m gonna release the whole album on YouTube and SoundCloud on my birthday. It’s the best I can do, but at least it makes the album the “birthday album”.

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday EP/Album Remixes
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
lemonboy:

Maybe try a little early…

GR3Y:

30th of May shall be the release date (was the earliest I could get).

I’ll try and see if I can do anything, but all-in-all… they ain’t likely to budge on release schedule. So be prepared for the wait.

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday EP/Album Remixes
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
Thank you for everyone who participated. The album (yes, it’s an album) has been submitted and under review. The album contains one original track and 7 remixes of the same track (and I love all of them).

Unfortunately, the new review timeframe has been extended to 28 days, meaning that the birthday album… is not gonna be a birthday album anymore. Still, we have a great album… just need to wait a bit longer for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday EP/Album Remixes
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
Any genre. More variety is better in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday EP/Album Remixes
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
The EP/Album is planned for 24th of May. Since the reviewing stage takes 21 days, I want to make sure that the remixes are done before the 1st of May.

Read full topic
